attributes.action: Send the British army into Uganda to capture child murderer Joseph Kony
attributes.additional_details:
Joseph Kony is the brutal leader of the LRA in Uganda, he has abducted about 30,000 children to force them to fight in his army, Joseph Kony’s tactics were—and remain—brutal. He often forced children to kill their parents or siblings with machetes or blunt tools. He abducted girls to be sex slaves for his officers. He brainwashed and indoctrinated the children with his lies and manipulated them with his claim of spiritual powers.

His reign of fear must stop, these children must be freed of fear and pain and death, please help by sending in the army to rid of this evil dictator.

Click on the links for the full story

http://www.invisiblechildren.com/history-of-the-war

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y4MnpzG5Sqc
